text:
BSF jawans guarding border outposts have arrested nine persons, including eight Bangladeshis, in the Habibpur area of Malda, a police official said on Saturday.

The 31 battalion of the Border Security Force arrested eight Bangladeshis who had infiltrated into the country from two border outposts of Kedaripara and Beldanga under the Habibpur police station on Friday night, the official said.

They also arrested an Indian, who was their local contact.

The arrested Bangladeshis were aged between 25 and 30.

On being questioned, they said they were trying to locate the house of their local contact who had promised them jobs, police said. — PTI
title: BSF arrests eight Bangladeshis in Malda
